short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Titiro - The search engine that supports New Zealand business

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
➤  How it works
titiro is a search engine like other search engines, but very different: we work hard to ensure New Zealand businesses rise to the top of the search results. Making it easy for you to support local.

➤  Privacy, not just promises
We're interested in supporting New Zealand business, not your data: we don’t save your searches, we don’t sell your data to advertisers, and your searches are always SSL-encrypted.

➤  Our mission
We’re on a mission to help New Zealand business recover and thrive. Right now loads of us are looking for simple ways to support New Zealand businesses. Who knew the simple act of choosing a New Zealand grown search engine could help change the fortunes of our nation.

➤  Advertising on titiro
At titiro, advertisements are shown beside or above the search results. If you click on these adverts, we earn commission which allows us to continue in business. Rest assured we do not sell or give your data to our advertisers.
